scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Correspondence series consists of correspondence regarding politics, holidays, events, thank you cards, Ford's birthday, and general topics sent by various people including politicians such as Presidents Ronald Reagan, George H. W. Bush, and Bill Clinton, ca. 1968-1998 and undated. Of particular interest is correspondence from the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Fund (1984), George Bush regarding a vote to aid Egypt (1990), the Close Up Foundation (1984, includes photograph), and the Owensboro Symphony (1997, includes a photograph). This series is arranged chronologically.
